Reason: The 'depths.reflection' configuration option in the 'sunflow' software project is performance-sensitive. Changing the value of this configuration can significantly impact the rendering performance of the software. A higher value for 'depths.reflection' can increase the complexity of the scene rendering, leading to longer execution times and higher memory consumption. Conversely, a lower value can reduce the quality of reflections in the rendered images, affecting the overall visual output of the software. Therefore, any change in the 'depths.reflection' configuration can have a noticeable impact on system performance.
